resource.chars:
The hypothesis that 
the nervous energy is 
antagonistic to an attraction 
constantly exerted by the 
particles of muscle one 
upon the other is well 
worthy of consideration 
but it can only be damaged 
by such loose and 
inaccurate statements 
as Dr. Radcliffe has 
brought forward in its 
favour -
In the opening paragraph 
Dr. Radcliffe - calls the
